attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: All I can say about this app is yikes 😳😬who decided this was a good idea? This has zero everyday use. Its designed to sit on your phone and collect information on you (spyware). DONT DOWNLOAD. Also not to mention the several bugs that make me want to vomit every time I see them. Did I say bugs? I meant the trump administration. Why’d you decide to create an app full of filthy and ugly people? Zero class here.

attributes.title: Worst APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep update with the upcoming election because I love my President. Well, I’d say I downloaded it sometime around Monday morning at 8:00. IT ISNT FINISHED DOWNLOADING UNTIL THURSDAY. That is theee entire days. The app kept crashing, and my phone kept glitching after downloading it. I highly suggest if you want any information on President Trump you use the news or Internet, not this app. Hope this helps someone else!

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app completely wiped all my data and took ages to download. Once I opened the app it crashed multiple times and I actually had to force power my phone off. I’m still trying to get my phone back to the way it was before and I’m actually shocked that this is happening especially from an official app. I might have to get a new phone

attributes.title: Made my phone catch on fire
attributes.review: Downloaded and my phone battery IMMEDIATELY exploded.  Instant fire.  My apartment complex burned down because the fire was apparently toxic and didn’t respond to water.  Firefighters said the flames must have come from the depths of hell and they had never seen anything like it.  Will be filing insurance claim for all of my belongings.  Also destroyed my brain cells, too bad there’s no insurance policy for that.

attributes.title: bunker boy😤💋👁👅👁
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! THIS APP TRACKS HOW MUCH YOU EAT AND SLEEP JUST TO STALK YOU. Donald trump is not to trust: he is hidden in the ✨bunker✨ and very dangerous. He said in the notification tab if you don’t turn the notifications on, he will press the red button in the oval office. Trump is a fraud and using you for his money. He created a fake college, and now he created a fake app to fool you. 🌸DO NOT TRUST THIS MAN. Daddy’s money won’t do you well on this one, Mr. Bunker boy🌙This app is psychotic and terrible.

attributes.title: Bruh this weird
attributes.review: I get on after at least a year of downloading and suggest the manny flag replace the american flag I was immediately told this will never happen but the manny flag be clappin no cap i complain to the creator of the app and the boomer tells me to stop with the manny flag but the manny flag represents freedom for the manny and his family please bring awareness to the struggles manny is facing and delete this app it is harmful to mannys legacy and must be shut down. 🦄🍄💐🦋✨💫🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.title: How is this even on the App Store??
attributes.review: Doesn’t work at all!!!!! So slow and glitchy. Also the first thing they do is ask for personal information unbelievable. I can’t believe trump created this app this is something I’d expect from CHINA!!! COMMUNIST APP. Literally took like so many hours to even download and when it did I could use it because it was so slow. What a let down ;,(

attributes.title: It was broken : 0 Stars
attributes.review: I thought this app would be great to give me a different perspective of our President, Donald Trump. Instead it made me hate him even more. He slanders the other side and has no respect for anyone, not even himself. (That shade of orange amplifies his lack of self respect let me tell ya). I wish i could give this app 0 stars and I hope Apple takes if off the appstore. I also think it hacked my phone.

attributes.title: This app is literally evil
attributes.review: I had every intention of downloading this app so I could support the best guy out there, Mr. Donald J Trump, because he is such an unproblematic king. But even though this app appears free, it isn’t! DO NOT BE DECEIVED. As soon as I went to download it the devil appeared to claim my soul. Now I am just walking around soulless but at least I can still leave a review. Please don’t lose your soul for this it’s honestly not worth it.

attributes.title: It leads to viruses!!!!
attributes.review: My phone has started to glitch and lose information that was very important!!! DO NOT GET THIS APP, My phone burns out and it has made my battery lose power 10x faster than before. It takes up all of your storage and gives false information while going through your phone and finding your personal information.
